name: ideal.II: a Galerkin Space-Time Extension to the Finite Element Library deal.II
description: An extension to the finite element library deal.II (www.dealii.org) for tensor-product space-time finite elements
schema:releaseNotes:
# Initial version

- Four example steps showing usage of the library
  - step-1: Heat equation as a prototypical example
  - step-2: Stokes equation as an example for coupled problems
  - step-3: Heat equation (again) to show usage of MPI parallel linear algebra
  - step-4: Navier-Stokes equation as an example of a nonlinear coupled problem
- Doxygen API documentation of the libraries classes and functions
- Sphinx based main documentation 
  - Explanation of the underlying mathematics (still WIP)
  - Documentation of all examples including an introduction, commented source code and discussion of results
